4310410.name: MOVING WITH THE MOON: Mastering Universal Gravitation! Demo
4310410.description:
A New Action Game Where You Steer The Earth

This DEMO version allows you to play stages 1 to 10.

[Simple Rule, Easy For Anyone To Play (Casual Game)]

Steer the Earth, when both the Earth and the Moon are in the goal zone, the stage is cleared.

    The Earth, the Moon, and other stars, have universal gravitation. You can't steer the Moon, but You can use the Earth's gravitational force to pull on the Moon.

    Depending on the stage, there will be other stars, black holes, white holes, walls. There will be also a large stage that cannot fit on one screen.

[Experience The Universal Gravitation Virtually]

The Earth, the Moon, and other stars, are constantly pulling on each other with universal gravitation. You can experience a simulated universal gravitation.

[Play Any Stage You Like At Any Time.]

You can play any stage you want at any time.

[Choose Your Preferred Game Speed]

You can choose the game speed you like. If you are not good at this type of game, you can make it easier by slowing down the game speed. If you are good at this type of game, you can make it more difficult by increasing the game speed.

[Enjoy Clearing With Good status]

When you clear a stage, the best states

  • Time

  • Earth Damage

  • Farthest To The Moon

  • Distance Steered

  • of the stage will be recorded.

You can enjoy clearing the game with the best states possible.

[Records For Each Player]

You can change player number. The best records for each stage are saved for each player.

[Not Too Hard]

We try to keep the difficulty level from being too hard. We want to make sure that you enjoy the various stages. Many of the stages are short, and allowing you to quickly restart or try again.

    If it's too easy for you, we recommend that you try to speed up the game or aim to clear it with a good records.

[Quick Startup And Fast Screen Transitions]

This game is designed for quick startup and fast screen transitions so that you can always play right away.

    The logo doesn't appear for a while after starting up. There is no animation when transitioning between screens, so it doesn't take long. There are no long loading times before the game starts.

[Enjoyable Even For Spectators]

Because the rules and controls are very simple, it's enjoyable even for spectators.

[Generally Fine To Post Videos On Social Media]

Posting or livestreaming gameplay videos of this game on social media(YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, or others) is generally fine. (If any problems arise, we will consider how to deal with them.)

[Play With Keyboard Or Game Controller(XInput type)]

You can play with either a keyboard or a XInput game controller. (Buttons on the menu screen, etc. can also be pressed with the left mouse button.)

[How To Operate The Menu Screen, Etc.]

When operating with the keyboard

[↑][↓][←][→]: Moving the cursor

Enter or Space: Confirm

When using a game controller(XInput type)

Left stick or Directional pad: Moving the cursor

[A] or [START]: Confirm

[How To Operate On The Game Screen]

When operating with the keyboard

[↑][↓][←][→]: Steer the Earth

[F]: The Earth speed up

[D]: The Earth slow down

Enter or Space: Pause

When using a game controller(XInput type)

Left stick or Directional pad: Steer the Earth

[X]: The Earth speed up

[Y]: The Earth slow down

[A] or [START]: Pause

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
